Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-31755 affecting package apparmor for versions less than 3.0.4-4
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-31755 affecting package apparmor for versions less than 3.0.4-4. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package apparmor is earlier than 3.0.4-4, affected by CVE-2024-31755
